She has always wanted to get independent since her husband has several other wives, so he has always not adequately provided for her and the children. For this reason, through small savings, she resorted to beginning a retail shop that she has seen grow over time. She can now fund her needs as well as those of her children.

The reason for the loan is not just to be able to buy an assortment of rice, flour, cooking fat, soft drinks, toiletries, stationery, and pampers among other items that she will sell to her customers to increase her income.
 
She appreciates the support from UGAFODE and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To restock her retail shop

loans.name: Nanu Group

texts.en:
Buaphan understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families.  Buaphan knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Buaphan purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  

The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Buaphan is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Khou Group

texts.en:
Khamhuang is excited the filter was available on an affordable, payment plan.  Khamhuang and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.  

The water filter Khamhuang and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five years.  Khamhuang and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Khamhuang and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Namtom Group

texts.en:
Khammerng understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families.  

Khammerng knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Khammerng purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  

The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Khammerng is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single and has four children, all of whom go to school. She takes care of one additional family member. She operates a beauty salon in a shop that she rents. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. She gets additional income from selling charcoal. She has requested a loan from MCDT – SACCO to buy hair relaxers, treatments, shampoo, braids, weaves, and a hand dryer. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a plot of land. She lives in her own house, and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy hair relaxers, treatments, shampoo, braids, and weaves

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es: La señora Clementina vive en el municipio de Entre Ríos, del trópico de Cochabamba, junto a sus cuatro hijos y su esposo. La familia se dedica a la agricultura trabajando en un terreno agrícola propio que se compraron hace dos años. Ellos lograron comprar este terreno con mucho esfuerzo y después de muchos de años de trabajo. Actualmente producen yuca y plátano, los cuales son vendidos a los intermediarios que vienen a comprar al lugar de cosecha. La producción es familiar, pero ocasionalmente contratan personal eventual que los ayuda en el mantenimiento y cosecha de los productos. Actualmente cuentan con 1 hectárea y media de yuca y media hectárea de plátano, las cuales representan la totalidad de su fuente de sustento económico. Es por esto que la señora Clementina quiere diversificar su producción y comenzar a plantar piña, la cual se está convirtiendo en un producto rentable y de fácil manejo. Con este motivo es que la Sra. Clementina requiere un capital de Bs. 8000, para así mejorar sus ingresos y poder comprarse un terreno urbano y cumplir su sueño de construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Clementina lives with her four children and her husband in the Entre Ríos municipality in the tropics of Cochabamba.  The family devotes itself to agriculture by working their own farm land that they bought two years ago.  They managed to buy this land with great effort and after many years of work.  

They currently produce yucca and bananas, which are sold to intermediaries who come to the place of harvest to make their purchases.

It is a family production, but they sometimes hire temporary personnel to help with the maintenance and to harvest the products.  They currently have one and a half hectares of yucca and a half of a hectare of bananas.  These represent their entire source of financial support.

That is why Clementina wants to diversify her production and start planting pineapples.  This is becoming a profitable product that is easy to manage.  

This is the reason that Clementina needs a loan for 8,000 BOB to be able to buy an urban piece of land and to fulfill her dream of building her own house.

loans.use: to diversify her production by planting pineapples.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Riza works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling dried fish.  Riza is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell for her general store business.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 48 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of household goods to sell.

Josephine has borrowed and paid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from buy-and-sell charcoal.

Josephine aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of household goods to sell

loans.name: Judy

texts.en: Judy works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 50,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fruits to sell. Judy has been in this business for seven years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fruits to sell

loans.name: Phoukerng Group

texts.en:
Ka is excited the filter was available on an affordable, payment plan.  Ka and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.  

The water filter Ka and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five years.  Ka and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Ka and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is 58 years old and she lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. Emma has been working since 1972 at the hospital as a sanitary worker. Emma’s daughter is divorced and she has a 16-year-old daughter. They live together with Emma. Emma’s son now is temporally in the Russian Federation where he works and earns for his family's living. Emma is sad and the loss of her beloved husband in 2013 changed her life entirely. She mentions that although having very good children who care for her very much, she greatly feels the absence of her husband. This loan of 700,000 Armenian drams Emma wants in order to pay for a tombstone in memory of her lovely husband.

loans.use: to pay for a tombstone in memory of her lovely husband

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla Patricia,  casada, tiene 2 pequeños hijos, de edades de 2 y 8 años por  los cuales ella y su esposo luchan a diario para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Lleva 4 años de tener su propia venta de comida desde su casa. Ella inicio este pequeño negocio con su propio ahorro de dinero.  ‘
El propósito de solicitar este préstamo es para la compra de los materiales para la elaboración de la comida, como son carne, arroz, condimentos, aceite, pollo, verduras y otros. 
Con las ganancias obtenidas, desea  poder cumplir uno de sus sueños el cual sería crear una mini-pulpería en su hogar y ofrecer a sus clientes la venta de granos básicos, gaseosas, jabón, etc.
texts.en:
Karla Patricia is married and has two small children, ages two and eight.  She and her husband struggle every day in order to give them a better quality of life.

She has had her own business of selling food from her house for four years.  She started this small business with her own money that she saved.

The reason for requesting this loan is to buy materials to make food.  She will buy things like meat, rice, condiments, cooking oil, chicken, vegetables, and others.

With the earnings that she gets she wishes to be able to fulfill one of her dreams.  That would be to create a mini-market at her house and to sell basic grains, soft drinks, and soap, etc. to her customers.

loans.use: to buy materials like meat, rice, condiments, cooking oil, chicken, vegetables, and others to make food.

loans.name: Truphena

texts.en:
Truphena is a smallholder farmer from the Kapsowar region of Kenya. Kapsowar is a high-altitude area whose landscape is hilly and covered in green vegetation. Truphena practices dairy farming on her small piece of land, which lies along a very steep slope. Such lands are good for livestock but can hardly support crop farming unless the intention of the farmer is to lose crops and the fertile layer of soil to erosion. 

Truphena is seeking a loan of KES 52,750 to add an additional cow on her farm. Having more cows will increase her milk production output and family income as well. She will also use part of the money to have an insurance cover for the asset so that in the event of death of the animal, she will be compensated. 

The impact of your loan to Truphena and her family will be an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Fatma

texts.en:
Thirteen years ago, Fatma’s husband died of a sudden heart attack leaving her with four children to support.  For many years, she has been a nurse and for seven years she has been running a small health clinic, which has been successful due to its good service.  With this loan, she will buy medical supplies.  She is grooming them to take over the business.  She has given support to her third child to get married and is supporting her fourth child’s education.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Fatma eşini 13 yıl önce kalp krizinden kaybetmiş. 2 kız, 2 erkek çocuk annesi olan Fatma hemşire olarak uzun yıllar kuruluşlarda çalışmış. Yedi yıldır küçük bir sermaye ile kurduğu sağlık kabinini işletiyor.  Aldığı kredi ile sağlık malzemesi alacak.  Çevrede iyi hizmet verdiğinden dolayı seviliyor. Çocuklarını yetiştiriyor ve onları iş sahibi yapıyor. Üçünün evlenmelerine yuva kurmalarına destek vermiş.4. Çocuğunun eğitimine destek oluyor.

loans.use: to purchase medical supplies

loans.name: Rystem

texts.en:
Rystem has been photographed with the items he sells in the streets of the city where he resides. He is an Egyptian Albanian and buying/selling used or new items in the streets or booths is something that members of his community have been practicing since the collapse of the regime and they are very good at it and take pride in their efforts.
 
Rystem is 42 and has two children 14 and 7 years old. He has been doing this type of activity for the past two and a half years; during the summer months he goes to the beach where he serves fresh made popcorns to the beach goers. 

Rystem is seeking your financial help to buy items to resell.

loans.use: to stock up on inventory items such as socks and underwear to resell

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty is a single mother of five children, four of whom go to school. She has operated a beauty salon for 10 years. She resides in the family house where they have access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and medication. She works from home seven days a week and operates on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include seasonality and power shortages. She has requested a loan from MCDT-SACCO to buy relaxers, hair oils, treatments, shampoo, braids and weaves. She would like to start selling cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy relaxers, hair oils, treatments, shampoo, braids and weaves

loans.name: Vardush

texts.en: Vardush lives with her son in the village of Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region. She used to work as a cook, then as a cleaner at the restaurant, but now she is busy only with farming and agriculture. With her 29-year-old son, Vardush takes care of her farm cattle such as cows, calves, a bull, pigs and chickens. On her plot of land, she cultivates potatoes and a great assortment of greens, which she sells at the city’s wholesale market. Her farm’s milk, meat and eggs she sells right from her house to her regular customers and neighbors. Her husband is in the Russian Federation doing different construction work. He transfers some money for his family's needs. Still, Vardush has a lot of half-done work about her farm, because of the lack of money. With this loan, she plans to buy potato seedlings, diesel fuel, fertilizer and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, diesel fuel, fertilizer and also animal fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Tatevik

texts.en: This young lady is 20 years old and her name is Tatevik. She lives with her parents and sister in the village of Ddmashen in the Gegharkunik region. Tataveik is a very famous hairdresser in her village and she has a lot of customers. Simultaneously with her work, she manages to be engaged in farming. With her parents, she takes care of cows, heifers, pigs, sheep and chickens. With her mother, Tatevik sells farm products; milk, macun (national dairy-product), meat and eggs to their already-regular customers, the number of which is rather big. This lady mentions that she really enjoys her work about the farm and is sure that one day. she will be able make it richer with animals and with more profit. This loan of 210.000 Armenian drams she will use for the purchase of fodder for her farm cattle for which she thanks you beforehand.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia es la propietaria de un restaurante que inicio en el año 2007 por necesidad económica y aprovechando sus habilidades para la cocina, ella es la cocinera y cuenta con la ayuda de dos meseras.

Celia tiene 47 años de edad, dos hijas ya mayores de edad, es una mujer muy activa, le preocupa mucho el fracaso por ello pone mucho empeño en que su negocio crezca y que los sientes tomen sentido de pertenencia con su restaurante.

Celia tiene como sueño poder abrir más sucursales en otras partes, tiene una imagen definida y quiere ver esa imagen en cada barrio de su departamento.

Gracias a su negocio ha ganado mejor calidad de vida, mejoras en su vivienda, puede apoyar a su madre y quiere estudiar, a su edad quiere aprender más de la cocina para explorar nuevas preparaciones para incluir en su restaurante.

Para lograr todos sus sueños Celia necesita apoyo, tu puedes ser una de las personas que brinden la mano a esta carismática morena, que solicita un préstamo para arreglar el enfriador, pagar a proveedores, comprar surtido de refrescos, papas en bolsa, dulces que vende en su restaurante y para un cambio de mesas.
texts.en:
Celia is the proprietor of a restaurant that she started in the year 2007.  She started out of financial need by taking advantage of her abilities in the kitchen.  She is the cook, and she has help from two waiters.

Celia, age 47, has two grown daughters.  She is a very active woman.  She worries a lot about failure, and that is why she puts forth a great deal of effort for her business to grow and for her customers to feel at home at her restaurant.

Celia dreams of being able to open more branches in other places.  She has a clear picture, and she wants to see this picture in each neighborhood of her department.

Thanks to her business, she has earned a better quality of life and improvements to her home.  She is able to support her mother, and she wants to go to school.  At her age she wants to learn more about cooking in order to explore new dishes to include at her restaurant.

In order to achieve all of her dreams, Celia needs support.  You can be one of the people who lends a hand to this charismatic, dark-skinned woman.  She is requesting a loan to fix the fryer, to pay providers, to stock up on soft drinks, to buy sacks of potatoes, and to buy sweets that she sells at her restaurant.  She will also change tables.

loans.use: to stock up on soft drinks, to buy sacks of potatoes, to buy sweets that she sells at her restaurant, and to change tables.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en: Lusine, with her husband and son, lives in the village of Tsovagyugh, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Lusine is 39 years old and, never being employed, she started farming from a very young age and now with the help of her husband and son, she takes care of cows, calves, bulls, pigs, piglets and chickens. Her farm products are milk, meat, macun (national dairy-product), cheese and eggs, which her neighbors mostly buy from her. Lusine mentions that she is very happy to see how skillfully and with great pleasure her son helps her about the farm and she is sure that in the future, he will perfectly care for the farm, which is the only source of income for their family. This loan of 700,000 Armenian drams Lusine wants to use to purchase two calves and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to purchase two calves and also animal fodder for the farm cattle

loans.name: Erik

texts.en:
Erik is involved in a manufacturing business. Since 2012, he has been renting a working garage where he has been organizing production, installation and measurement of doors and windows. Erik receives orders from Goris town where he lives with his wife and two children. His children attend local secondary school and his wife is a housewoman. Erik himself is the only worker and breadwinner of the family.
 
To be able to purchase tools and materials for production of doors and windows, Erik has applied for this loan. He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.
 
Erik hopes to receive lenders' support and develop his manufacturing business so his family has better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for tools and materials for production of doors and windows to develop the business and earn more income for the family

loans.name: Samara

texts.ru: Самара успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день Самара имеет хорошее развитое хозяйство. В аренде есть 2,28 ГА поливной земли, где она выращивает фасоль под реализацию. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, овцы. Среднемесячный доход Самары до 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Самара обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений и семян для полеводства. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Samara successfully repaid her previous loan after using it for its intended purpose.  She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her obtain this financing.  Today, Samara has a well-developed farming business: she rents 2.28 hectares of irrigated land on which she grows beans for resale.  She also has two cows and some sheep on her farm.  She makes an average monthly income of up to 7,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 55,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizers and seeds for land cultivation.  She is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for land cultivation and to grow organic beans.

loans.name: Nurjamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве на сегодня есть 2 коровы, 15 овец. На 1,92 Га земли выращивает фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль в хороший сезон составляет до 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуржамал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки коровы, также удобрений, семян для полеводства. Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Nurjamal successfully repaid her previous loan.  She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with this financing.  She currently has two cows and 15 sheep on her farm.  She also grows beans for resale on 1.92 hectares of land.  If the season has been good, she makes a monthly income of up to 16,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, Nurjamal has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and therefore increase her livestock headcount.  She will also use part of her loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for land cultivation.  Nurjamal is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy one cow and some seeds and fertilizers for land cultivation.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor  tiene 36 años de edad, es casada, y vive con el esposo y tres hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ella el crédito lo quiere para la compra de unos cerdos. Ella quiere aumentar un poco la cantidad de animales, para tener más posibilidad de venderlos con un peso adecuado  y con ello ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia . Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Flor is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and three children and they are her highest priority. She wants to use this loan to buy pigs. She wants to increase her animal stock, so she can have the chance to sell them with a more appropriate weight and be able to offer a better quality of life to her family. This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She had never asked for a loan from another state bank, but FUDECOSUR has made the process very simple for her and they offer a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Olga sells women's shoes and swimwear. She is active and hardworking person. Previous KIVA loan helped Olga to increase her income. Olga has plans to develop her business further and open another sales location. 

Olga is asking for a loan of 40 000 UAH to increase the assortment of shoes and swimwear for upcoming season. Olga hopes to attract new customers and increse her sales.
texts.en:
Olga sells women's shoes and swimwear. She is an active and hardworking person. A previous Kiva loan helped Olga to increase her income. Olga has plans to develop her business further and open another sales location.

Olga is asking for a loan of 40,000 UAH to increase the assortment of shoes and swimwear for the upcoming season. Olga hopes to attract new customers and increase her sales.

loans.use: to increase her assortment of shoes and swimwear for the upcoming season

loans.name: Zumurat

texts.ru: Зумурат, 33 года, замужем, 4 детей. Образование среднее, более 7 лет занимается торговлей продуктов питания и сельским хозяйством. У Зумурат в хозяйстве есть 10 овец. На 1,38 Га земли она выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход - 19,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота и увеличения товара в обороте.  На полученные доходы от кредита Зумурат планирует и дальше развивать ее бизнес и хочет купить дополнительные земельные наделы.
texts.en: Zumurat is 33 years old, married, and the mother of four children.  She has a secondary education.  For more than seven years she has been selling food products and working in agriculture.  She has 10 sheep on her farm and she grows beans on 1.38 hectares of land.  She makes a monthly income of 19,000 som (KGS).  She has turned to Bai Tushum and is taking a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy some livestock and also to increase her inventory of goods.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her business and to buy additional plots of land.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock and to increase her inventory of goods for resale in her shop.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her General Store. Through her earnings she is able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expenses.

She would now like to apply for a 20,000 PHP loan which she will use as part of her working capital to buy more quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, instant noodles, and frozen foods which she sells at retail. She knows that more items in her store will yield more sales and thus increase her earnings. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs and for the education of her children. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Cecilia dreams of having a bigger General Store and aims to give her children the best education to allow them better opportunities in life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies .

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Jecksell Saddan

texts.es: Las ganas de superación y le entrega a los más necesitados son la que caracterizan a Jecksell, siempre le han gustado los animales es por esta razón que estudia Medicina Veterinario, cuenta con el apoyo de su mama y sus hermana en todo momento. Ahora Jecksell esta brindado consultas a sus clientes es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para comprar mesas de aceros para realizar cirugías de esta manera podrá salir adelante y terminar su carrera universitaria.
texts.en: His will for self-improvement and his dedication to the neediest characterize Jecksell. He has always liked animals, thus he studied Veterinary Medicine. He has the support from his mother and sister at all times. Now Jecksell is available for consultation with his clients. This is why he is asking for a loan to buy steel tables to perform surgeries, and consequently get ahead and finish his college career.

loans.use: To buy steel tables to perform surgeries.

loans.name: Yadhira

texts.es:
Yadhira tiene 39 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa de estación para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor stock de prendas de vestir, lo que tendrá gran influencia en el negocio, ella espera incrementar la variedad de la mercadería para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona, lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Yadhira is 39 years old. She lives with her partner and has two children. She lives with her family in the district of Oyotún, in a rural zone that is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The people in this district work in agriculture, commerce, and raising animals.

She works in clothing sales. Her business is located in her home. She has more than 5 years of experience in the business and has good personal and  work references from people in her district. She is applying for a loan to purchase a greater quantity of seasonal clothing in order to increase the stock of her business. This investment will serve her to have a greater stock of articles to wear, which will have a great influence on her business. She hopes to increase the variety of merchandise in order to be able to serve the various tastes and needs of the customers from the zone, which will generate greater income for her, which is going to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of seasonal clothing to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Don Mariano, a sus 60 años, es un hombre trabajador, casado y tiene 2 hijos, de los cuales 1 tiene a su responsabilidad. Estableció en su hogar un  pequeño negocio dedicado a la venta de frijoles  y maíz (granos básicos), del cual ha podido extraer ganancias y poder cubrir sus necesidades económicas. El comenzó su negocio con ayuda de otras micro- financieras  y se ha mantenido en el mercado durante 8 meses.
El préstamo que solicita, es para invertir y agrandar su negocio en otro ramo, como es el de la compra de productos derivados del pollo, como la menudencia, hígado y más. Esto con el objetivo de poder ofrecer a los clientes otros productos comestibles y así obtener mayores ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en:
Don Mariano, at the age of 60, is a hard-working man. He is married and has two children, of whom one is his responsibility. In his home he established a little business dedicated to selling beans and corn (basic grains), from which he has been able to extract earnings and cover his economic necessities. 

He began his business with help from other micro-finance companies, and he has maintained himself in the market for 8 months.

The loan that he is applying for is to invest and enlarge his business in another area, which is the purchase of products derived from chicken, such as giblets, liver, etc. He will do this with the goal of being able to offer his customers other foods and thus obtain greater income for his household.

loans.use: to buy products derived from chicken, such as giblets, liver, etc.

loans.name: Javahir

texts.en:
Javahir is 32 years old and she lives with her husband and father-in-law in the village Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region. Her husband is a driver and her father-in-law is also employed.

Javahir, having no higher education, has always been engaged in farming and today she can surely say that she is a skilled farmer. On her farm she has a cow, calves, bulls, sheep, and lambs. The main farm products that Javahir sells from her farm are milk, meat (beef, pork, and mutton) to city butchers, and also cheeses made of cow and sheep milk. Javahir decided to have a deal with Kiva lenders since she wants to buy one more calf for her farm and also fodder for her all farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy one more calf for her farm and also fodder for her all farm cattle.

loans.name: Fahriye

texts.en:
Fahriye is the mother of three children. She sold women’s clothing for many years before deciding to make a business selling her homemade manti (Turkish ravioli) pasta and savory pastries.

She has been accepting orders from her home for five years. Sometimes she sells at markets and stands. Her products are popular because they taste “like Mom used to make.” She wants to develop her business by opening a small store. With this loan she will buy supplies.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Fahriye çınar 3 çocuk annesi. Uzun yıllar kadın giyim satışı yapmış daha sonra evinde yaptığı mantı, makarna, börek herkes tarafından beğenilince ticaretini yapmaya karar vermiş. 5 yıldır evden sipariş alıyor. Zaman zaman pazarlara ve stantlara çıkıyor. Yaptığı ürünler anne tadında olduğu için beğeniliyor. Küçük bir dükkân açarak işlerini geliştirmek istiyor. Aldığı kredi ile malzeme alacak.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Füsun

texts.en:
Fusun took up felt working as a hobby after retiring and would like to make it her profession as it satisfies her soul to do creative work like this. She makes women’s bags, shawls, brooches, key chains, etc. Currently she is selling these goods at a market stand but her goal is to open up a small shop. With this loan she will buy supplies.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Füsun emekli olduktan sonra hobi olarak başladığı keçe işini, meslek haline getiriyor. Yaptığı iş kendisini maddi olarak tatmin etmese de manevi olarak tatmin ediyor. Keçeden kadın çantası, şal, broş, anahtarlık gibi birçok şey yapıyor. Bu ürünlerini stantlarda satıyor. Hedefi turistik bir dükkân açmak. Keçe işini yurtdışında da pazarlamak istiyor. Bu kredi ile malzeme alacak.

loans.use: to buy supplies for felt working.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with 6 children and all go to school. She takes care of one additional family member.

She sells used clothes at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. She has requested for a loan from MCDT – SACCO to buy bales of used clothes. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation.

Her goal and aspiration is to start selling different kinds of used products so as to increase her sales. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes

loans.name: Rina Elizabeth

texts.es: Rina, tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, reside en un sector del municipio del Progreso, Yoro. Lleva dos años de dedicarse a la venta de mercadería como ser ropa, champú, cremas, lociones, perfumes, utensilios de cocina, carteras y otros. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante y por encargo. Anteriormente ella se dedicaba a elaborar pasteles para vender. Actualmente esta solicitando el segundo préstamo a la institución que es por 21,000 lempiras, para comprar mas mercadería como ser ropa, cremas, lociones, carteras, vajillas y otros utensilios de cocina para mantener mayor inventario y aumentar las ventas. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio para graduar a sus hijos del colegio.
texts.en: Rina is 36 years old. She is a single mother, with two children and she lives in a sector of the municipality of Progreso, Yoro. She has worked for the past two years selling merchandise such as clothing, shampoos, creams, lotions, perfumes, kitchenware, purses and others. She sells on the street and on demand.  Before, she worked baking cakes to sell. She is currently asking for a second loan to the institution for 21,000 lempiras to buy more merchandise such as clothing, creams, lotions, purses, kitchenware, and other kitchen utensils to have a larger inventory and increase sales. Her plan is to make her business grow to have her kids finish school.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise such as clothing, lotions, creams, purses, kitchenware and other kitchen utensils for sale.

loans.name: Diosa

texts.en:
Diosa is 61 years old, married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Diosa has a fishing business in the Philippines. Diosa requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy a fishing net and other equipment. Diosa has been in this business for 40 years.

In the future, Diosa would like to save enough money to expand her business and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 37-year-old Fatmata. She is married, and has 2 children aged 20 and 18. She has 3 additional dependents who live with her, helping them with their schooling.

In 2001, Fatmata established her clothing business. She began her business to improve her standard of living. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,100,000 every month from this business.

She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase more clothing for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits and to increase her business capital. In the future, Fatmata plans to develop her business by expanding it to another place, to educate her children, and to build a house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more clothing for her shop

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Veuve et âgée de 45 ans, Abla est une femme mère de quatre enfants. Abla habite à Agoè et vend de la pâte bandée dans le quartier afin d’avoir le bénéfice nécessaire pour leur épanouissement. Pour arriver à ses fins, Abla s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour commander un sac de maïs et des condiments, Abla demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation.
texts.en:
Abla is a 45-year-old widowed mother of four. She lives in Agoe and sells corn mush in the neighborhood to generate enough profit for their development. To achieve her ends, Abla resupplies twice a month at the market.

Abla is requesting this loan to purchase one bag of maize and condiments, so she can have an income to support her children's education.

loans.use: buy one bag of maize and a few condiments

loans.name: Pedro Sixto

texts.es:
Pedro Sixto tiene 65 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como gallinas, pollos, patos, pavos, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del préstamo es para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales menores y alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto Pedro espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro Sixto is 65 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Cayalti, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Perú.

He makes a living raising and selling small animals such as hens, chickens, ducks, turkeys, among others. He has been doing this work for more than 10 years, so he has experience in this business and good personal and work references in his district. 

The loan is going to be used to buy a larger quantity of small animals and balanced food to fatten them with. With this, Pedro hopes to offer a larger quantity of animals to his clients, which will generate a greater income and thus will better the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of small animals and balanced food to fatten them up.

loans.name: Marie Jeannette

texts.fr:
58 ans mariée, Marie Jeannette a 7 enfants qui sont tous déjà mariés. Un petit fils dont les parents sont en difficulté et en province habite avec elle et à sa charge.
Elle vend des œufs depuis très longtemps. Les principaux clients sont localisés dans le même quartier qu'elle. Dès fois, elle fait aussi de la livraison  auprès des clients fixes. 
L'approvisionnement en quantité et de bonne qualité des clients est un facteur de réussite dans cette activité.
Même à son âge, elle veut encore développer son activité pour sécuriser sa retraite. C'était avec cette activité qu'elle a pu nourrir, vêtir et scolariser ses enfants, soutenir sa famille durant toutes ces longues années.
texts.en:
Marie Jeannette is 58 years old, married and the mother of seven adult children, all of them already married. One of her grandsons, whose parents live in a remote area and are going through a difficult time, lives with her and is supported by her. Marie Jeanette has been selling eggs for a very long time. Her customers mainly come from her own neighborhood. Sometimes she also makes deliveries to established customers.
In order to succedd in this business, she needs to be able to maintain a large stock of high quality.

In spite of her age, she would like to keep developing her business in order to provide for her retirement. It is thanks to this business that she has been able to feed, clothe and educate her children and support her family  through all the years.

loans.use: to buy eggs.

loans.name: Florine Eliane

texts.fr:
Agée de 41 ans, Florine est divorcée et mère de 2 garçons de 18 et 6 ans dont le dernier est encore en classe primaire auprès d'un établissement public. L'ainé l'appui dans l'exercice de son activité. Elle n'a jamais reçu aucune pension de la part de son ex-mari. C'est une femme combattive,et débrouillarde.
La boucherie est héritée de sa grand-mère,c'est cette dernière elle-même qui l'a formé en la matière et mis à sa disposition un fonds de démarrage il y a 17 ans.
L'objectif est de diversifier encore plus et augmenter la quantité des marchandises, d'améliorer le lieu de vente car actuellement c'est à la fois lieu d'habitation. Son rêve est de pouvoir construire une maison.
texts.en:
Florine is 41 years old, divorced and the mother of two sons, 18 and 6 years of age. Her youngest son attends a public elementary school. Her eldest son helps her out in her business. She never received any alimony from her ex-husband. She is a persevering and resilient person.

Florine has inherited a butcher shop from her grand-mother, who taught her this trade and provided a starting capital 17 years ago.
Florine's goal is to diversify and expand her selection of goods, and to improve her sales space as at present it is also serves as living quarters. Her hope is to be able to build a house.

loans.use: to buy pork, beef, organ meats, tenderloins, cold cuts etc.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
Eulalio tiene 38 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge y sus 05 hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales caprinos, actividad que viene realizando desde hace más de 5 años, además cuenta también con aves de corral como son patos, gallinas, etc. El cuenta con corral amplio donde cría a sus animales, tiene muy buenas referencia personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado caprino para luego comercializarlo, así logrará mejores ingresos y de esta manera podrá obtener mayores ganancias para que mejore su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eulalio is 38 years old. He lives in his own house with his common-law wife and his five children in the district of Pomahuaca, a community dedicated to agriculture, commerce, and livestock. It is located in the province of Jaen, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.
He has worked for the past five years raising and selling goats. He also raises poultry such as ducks, hens, etc. He has a large corral where he raises his animals. He has very good personal and work references in his district. The purpose of the loan is to purchase a larger quantity of goats to sell, thus he will have better income and larger profits to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of goats to sell.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto es un hombre de 42 años de edad, soltero, tiene 2 hijos varones de 21 y 11 años y una hija mujer de 15 años, y su negocio es la sastrería.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, independiente, paciente, constante, responsable y trabajador. su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘cruce villa Adela’ área que une a varias zonas de la ciudad, dónde el transporte público tiene paradas, desde este lugar las personas se pueden movilizar a otras zonas alejadas, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Ernesto es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura,  complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus hijos; el mayor estudia y trabaja y los menores estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la sastrería, que consiste; en realizar la entrevista con el cliente, seleccionar el diseño textil, tomar las medidas, realizar los moldes y proceder a cortar, Se ajustan los detalles, y se realiza la entrega de la prenda en percha y funda, "El buen sastre sabe cortar, proporcionar, juntar los pedazos, repulgar, echar ribetes,  y coser bien la ropa…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que por los años de experiencia que tiene cuenta con una cartera de clientes establecida, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para la compra de tela. Su sueño es abrir una tienda de trajes, él desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de tela por rollo para la confección de trajes de vestir. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 21 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Ernesto solicita un préstamo para la compra de rollos de tela para la confección de trajes para abrir una tienda de trajes de vestir.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 42 years old, single and has two sons, ages 21 and 11, and one 15-year-old daughter. His business is tailoring. He is a good father, enterprising, independent, patient, tenacious, responsible and hard-working. He carries out his business in the "cruce villa Adela" area which links several areas of the city and where there are public transportation stops. From this area, people can travel around to other remote areas. It has a cold and dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 2-14 degrees Celsius. 

Ernesto is dark-skinned, has brown eyes, short black hair, short stature, and a thin physique. His native language is Aymará which he speaks with family, and he speaks Spanish in public and for his business. He shares his life with his children. The eldest studies and works and the younger ones are in school. They live in their own home made of brick and cement with a tin roof. It has running water, electricity, gas and sewage. 

His business is tailoring, which includes: carrying out an interview with the client, selecting the design, taking measurements, making the patterns and proceeding to cut. They fit the details and the garment is delivered on a hanger and in a bag. "A good tailor knows how to cut, adapt, put the pieces together, hem, add edging, and sew the clothing well..." he comments. 

The advantage of his business is that for the years of experience he has, he can count on a portfolio of established clients. The disadvantage is the lack of money to invest in buying fabric. 

His dream is to open a suit shop. He wants to expand his business through the purchase of bolts of fabric to make dress suits. This is the 1st sequence of loans with the institution in 21 years that he has been doing this work. It is for these reasons that Ernesto is asking for a loan to buy bolts of fabric to make suits, in order to open a dress suit shop.

loans.use: to buy bolts of fabric to make suits, in order to open a dress suit shop.

loans.name: Uulbolsun

texts.ru: Уулболсун, 31 год, замужем, 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, она спокойная, уравновешенная и трудолюбивая. Уулболсун занимается сельским хозяйством, на сегодняшний день у нее есть корова, 7 овец, на 2,48 Га земли выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели. Доходы от кредита она будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и образование ее детей.
texts.en:
Uulbolsun is 31 years old, married, and the mother of three. She has received secondary education. She is a calm, self-composed and hard-working person. Uulbolsun is engaged in farm work. At present she owns one cow and seven sheep; she also grows beans on a field of 2.48 ha [6 acres]. Her monthly income is approximately 10,000 KGS. 

Uulbolsun has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 55,000 KGS to buy a heifer. She will invest the revenues from her loan in a further development of her business and in her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase one heifer in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Rosa Virginia

texts.es: Rosa es una microempresaria emprendedora de 39 años de edad, casada y madre de 3 hijos, solicita por cuarta vez el financiamiento en Adim, con las ganancias del crédito anterior logro terminar de pagar su camioneta, ella se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos y ropa con ayuda de su hija desde hace cuatro años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de blusas, pantalones, ropa interior y perfumes.
texts.en:
Rosa is an small business enterpriser who is 39 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 children. 

This is her 4th time asking for funding through Adim. With the earnings of the last loan, she was able to finish paying off her van. She works in selling cosmetics and clothing with the help of her daughter for the last 4 years. 

She is asking for the loan to buy blouses, pants, underwear and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, underwear and perfumes.

loans.name: Aysel

texts.en:
Aysel is married with two children.  She has been working at making glass art for local and international tourists for three years. She has a small shop and workshop where she creates imaginative designs to sell.  Her husband and children also help her in this process.  She has had orders from abroad.  With the Maya loan, she would like to buy raw materials so that she can continue producing glass art.  With this, she would like to provide a better future for her family.


Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Aysel evli ve 2 kız çocuk annesi.  Cam sanatları işi ile uğraşıyor.  3 yıldır bu işi yapıyor.  Müşterileri yerli ve yabancı turistler.  Cam sanatlarıyla ilgili küçük bir dükkânı ve küçük bir atölyesi var.  Camı hammadde olarak alıyor üretiyor ve dükkânında perakende olarak satıyor.  Sipariş alırsa toptan satış da yapıyor.  Yurtdışından aldığı küçük çaplı siparişleri olmuş.  Hayal gücüyle farklı modeller tasarlayıp üretiyor.  Eşi ve çocukları da üretim yaparken kendisine yardımcı oluyorlar çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.  Maya’dan aldığı krediler ile camı hammadde olarak toplu alıyor.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: Saniya

texts.en: Saniya is a housewife and a mother of a son; she requires funds to buy a new rickshaw for her husband. The family's income is generated through the transportation business and they barely make ends meet. Saniya's husband is the main earner of the family and generates all his the income from driving the rickshaw. Unfortunately, the current rickshaw has completely broken down, halting the inflow of income. This has resulted in Saniya's son skipping school due to lack of resources at his mother's disposal. Hence, Saniya wants a loan to help her husband to buy a new rickshaw and start generating income once again, which would streamline all her activities and send her son back to school to get an education.

loans.use: to purchase a new rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new tools for his construction work

loans.name: Abibatu

texts.en: This is 40 year-old Abibatu.  She is married and has four children who are 14, 10, 7, and 3 years old. Three of them are school-going children. In 2002, Abibatu established her food stuff (palm oil, rice, beans etc.) business.  Working 5 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 3,800,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Abibatu has already received and successfully repaid three loans, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase gallons of palm oil and bags of rice. In the future, Abibatu plans to concentrate on improving her business. Abibatu is very grateful as the loan has helped her a lot in maintaining a good footing in her business.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy gallons of palm oil and bags of local rice.

loans.name: Malohat

texts.en: Malohat is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1973. She is living in a small village famous for pure and clean water. She is married and has two children. She has many years of experience doing business in agriculture. She plants strawberries, raspberries and tomatoes. She works seasonally. During the summer period, she plants tomatoes, strawberries and greens. It was hard for her to do business in the beginning, but she dismissed them all and worked hard to have a good harvest. Every day she gains a harvest and sells it in the domestic market. She feeds her family with the earned money. Now she is asking for a loan from Kiva lenders to buy fertilizer and natural chemicals to have a good harvest and earn money to live. She hopes to be supported by IMON and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and natural chemicals to have a good harvest and earn money to live

loans.name: Şahizer

texts.en:
Şahizer is married and has a daughter.  Like her family, she works with meerschaum stone, making jewellery from it and selling it from a shop.  She will use the loan to buy raw stone and make additional types of jewellery from it.  She makes the jewellery in a room at her home during the evenings and sells the items at the store.  Her goal is to open a workshop and expand globally and sell her products abroad.  She wants her 7-year-old daughter to have a good future.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Şahizer hanım evli bir kız çocuk annesi.  Aile mesleği olan lületaşı işlemeciliğini takı haline getiriyor ve dükkânında satıyor. Maya'dan aldığı kredi ile lületaşını ham olarak aldı ve bunu isleyerek ürün çeşidini artırdı. Evinin bir odasında lületaşını akşamları işliyor ve dükkânında satışını yapıyor. Hedefi atölye açmak ve  dünyaya açılmak, ürünlerini dünya çapında pazarlamak istiyor. Yedi yaşındaki kızına iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy raw stone.

loans.name: Hülya

texts.en:
Hulya is a mother of two children. Before her divorce, she worked with her husband to open a clothing and shoe store.  Now that she is single, she is taking care of all of the sales, purchasing of goods, and general management of the shop on her own.  It has been difficult work, but she feels the shop is doing well.  In order to provide a better future for her children, she would like expand her shop with the help of a Maya loan.  With the loan from Maya, she will increase the variety of shoes in the store.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff

Hülya 2 çocuk annesi,  ilk olarak iş hayatına eşinin açmış olduğu ayakkabı ve giyim mağazasın da eşine yardımcı olmak amacıyla başlamıştır.  Eşiyle ayrıldıktan sonra dükkânın bütün işleriyle kendisi ilgilenmeye başlamış.  Tüm gün dükkân da durup satışı ve mal alışını kendisi üstlenmiş.  Çok yoğun bir şekilde müşterisi olan hülya hanım işlerini iyice büyütüp daha geniş çaplı dükkân açmayı hedefliyor.  Dükkânını istikrarlı bir şekilde büyüteceğine inanıyor. Hayali ise dükkânından sağladığı kazanç ile çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek ve güzel yaşam sağlamak.  Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile dükkanın da ayakkabı çeşidini arttırmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Zhaneta

texts.en:
Zhaneta is 41 years old and she lives with her big family in the village of Ddmashen in the Gegharkunik region. Zhaneta has a vocational education with the specialty of pedagogue and for several years she worked at the kindergarten. Now she is engaged in farming and agriculture and mainly through this, she and her husband manage to cover their family needs. Her husband is a taxi driver. Zhaneta has two boys and a daughter. Her elder son lives and works abroad. The smaller son is school-aged and her daughter is a student. In the future, her daughter will also be a pedagogue like her mother. The hardship is that she studies in the paid division and this is really a great problem for this family.

This loan of 210,000 Armenian drams that Zhaneta is asking for is to pay her daughter’s tuition for the second semester.

loans.use: to pay her daughter’s tuition for the second semester

loans.name: İlknur

texts.en:
İlknur is married with four children.  She runs a meerschaum shop with her husband.  She buys unprocessed stone to work into her products, which she does in a workshop in her house.  Her husband does the sales at their shop.  She will use the loan from Maya to buy raw stone to work with and increase her sales.  İlknur wants to open a workshop and improve her children’s future.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
İlknur hanım evli ve dört çocuk annesi.  Eşiyle beraber lületaşı dükkanı işletiyor. Evde bir odasını atölye haline getirerek çalışmalarına orada devam ediyor.  Dükkanda satışlarını eşi gerçekleştiriyor.  Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile lüle taşını ham olarak aldı ve işleyerek satışlarını artırdı.  İlknur hanım bir atölye açmak ve çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy raw meerschaum to process in her workshop.

loans.name: Taqi

texts.en:
Taqi is a 24-year-old single man from Atteel, a village near Tulkarm city. He works with his family on their agricultural land. They plant seasonal crops and sell them in the local market.

Taqi took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to prepare other land for the new season by building greenhouses and buying seeds. This will increase his productivity and also his income.

Taqi appears in the photo.

loans.use: to prepare land for the new season by building greenhouses and buying seeds.

loans.name: Mükerrem

texts.en:
Mukerrem is the mother of four children. For years, she worked for other people. She was able to save some money at the place she worked and opened up a small business. With the profits from the business she was able to pay off her debts. As a woman who raised four children, she is hardworking, determined and ambitious.  

With this loan, she would like to expand her business so that she can make more profit in order to secure a better life for her children. With a loan from Maya, she will obtain more products for her business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Mükerrem 4 çocuk annesi,  çalışma hayatına önce başkalarının yanında çalışarak başlamış.  Daha sonra çalıştığı yerde ufak bir biriKim sağlayarak kendisine küçük bir işletme açmış.  Öncelikle sağladığı kazançla borçlarını kapatmış.  4 çocuğunu yetiştiren Mükerrem hırslı, çalışkan ve azimli bir bayan.  Gelecek ile ilgili planları ve ümitleri var.  Öncelikle ilk hedefi ise şuan ki işletmesinden daha büyük bir yer açmak ve işlerini kazancını büyütmek.  Bu sayede de çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek temin etmek istiyor.  Maya’dan alacağı kredi ile dükkanına daha fazla ürün temin edecek.

loans.use: to buy products for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her son purchase welding equipment for manufacturing iron accessories.

loans.name: Liezl

texts.en:
Liezl is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with one child.

She runs a dried fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, like a general store business.

Liezl dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Sovann

texts.en:
Sovann is from Banteay Chmar, a village in the north-west area of Cambodia.  She is 29 years old and lives in a single floor wooden house with her husband, 4-year-old son, and sister, who attends high school.  Her family owns 6 hectares of rice fields and 2,5 hectares of cassava fields.  In 2002,  she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise fighting against rural exodus and for the empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. 

Sovann makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe.  She uses her weaving income to pay for her family expenses.  With the loan, she will buy silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. 

Please support her so she can keep making beautiful traditional hand woven scarves!

loans.use: to buy silk and pay for loom preparation related fees.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en:
This is 45-year-old Musu. She is married and has five children, aged 3, 8, 9, 13 and 15. She has two additional dependents who live with her and are helping her with her business.  

In 2000, Musu established her rubber items and pan sets business. She began her business to assist her husband and improve their standard of living. Working six days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,100,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Musu has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to pay for rubber (plastic) and metal utensils and dishes. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits and to improve her business capital and add more profit. 

In the future, Musu plans to expand her business, to educate her children and to build a house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for rubber (plastic) and metal utensils and dishes

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is 28 years old, and she lives with her family in the village Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region. Armine’s husband usually goes to the Russian Federation for abroad work, and Armine mainly alone manages to take care of her farm. 

Armine has two boys, 7 and 3 years old. She is happy to mention that her elder greatly helps her in the farm work, and he is a rather strong and active boy. 

In her farm, Armine has cows, calves, bulls, heifers, a pig, sheep, lambs and chickens. All this livestock she takes care of and feeds alone, but very skillfully. She sells a lot of milk, meat, macun (national dairy product), cheese and eggs. 

Armine mentions that if ever farming brings enough income for her family, she impatiently waits for her husband finally to come back and never to leave them. Still she manages all the farm work alone and hopes for Kiva support. 

With this loan amount, she needs to buy a lot of fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy a lot of fodder for all her farm cattle

loans.name: Türkan

texts.en:
Türkan is married and the mother of two children.  She buys the stone raw and makes jewellery and pipes in her workshop to sell.  Her city has grown over the last few years, which has been good for business.  With this loan, she will buy meerschaum which allows her to contribute to her household and the national economy.  She says female experts on meerschaum do exist.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Türkan hanım evli ve iki çocuk annesi.  Ham olarak çıkan lüle taşını atölyede isleyerek, takı, pipo haline getiriyor. Ve satışını yapıyor.Aldığı kredi ile lületaşı alacak. Bulunduğu şehir son  yıllarda turizmde gelişme sağladığı için işleri de yavaş yavaş iyi gitmeye başlamış. Aile ve ülke ekonomisine katkı sağlıyor. Lüle taşında kadın ustalarında var olduğunu söylüyor.

loans.use: to buy meerschaum, to make pipes and jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.en:
Nazokat is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1985. She is living in a village with her big family. She is married and has three children. Her husband works in Russia. He went to Russia in order to earn money to feed his family. Nazokat has three year's practice doing business serving people. Her first business was in agriculture. She has been sewing beautiful traditional women's dresses for about three years. She earns money to help her husband with finances to feed their family. What Nazokat earns from her activity is spent on everyday needed items like food and clothes.

They live poor and have no good condition in their house to raise their children and live. She is planning to work hard and save up money but what she earns is not enough even to renovate her house. She is asking for a loan from Kiva lenders to renovate her house and live in better conditions. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Oscar Danilo

texts.es: Es un microempresario emprendedor de 42 años de edad, acompañado, padre de 2 niños que son su mayor motivación, es propietario de una pulpería en su domicilio y tiene un año dirigiendo este negocio, su principal meta es aumentar la oferta de productos, por tanto solicita el crédito para la compara de aceite, arroz, azúcar, avena, café y jabón.
texts.en: Oscar is a small-time entrepreneur. He is 42 years old and has a partner. He also has two children, his greatest motivation. Oscar owns a grocery store located in his house. He has been managing it for one year. Oscar’s goal is to increase the variety of products he has on sale and is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy rice, oil, sugar, porridge, coffee and soap.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar, porridge, coffee and soap.

loans.name: Las Vencedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Vencedoras, está en su tercer ciclo  dentro del programa de comité de mujeres, cada una de ellas pone su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo unido y  responsable de todas.
Gregoria es una de las que integra este grupo, ella vende cosméticos variados, tiene toda clase y toda marca, es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, que quiere salir adelante y es por eso que pone siempre lo mejor de sí para poder  mejorar.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar cosméticos variados para la venta, y con ello seguir con sus ventas, luchando por mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The “Las Vencedoras” group is on its third cycle as part of the women’s committee programme. Each member is putting in her biggest effort in order to grow and help their families. The group is close and its members are responsible.

Gregoria is one member of the group. She sells a variety of cosmetic products – all types and all brands. She is very hard-working and plucky. She wants to get ahead and therefore does the best she can in order to improve.

Gregoria is applying for this loan in order to buy a variety of cosmetics to sell. She can then continue with her sales and work hard to do better every day.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Jonathan Isai

texts.es: Jonathan es un joven de 26 años de edad que vive junto a su compañera de vida en una vivienda muy humilde que está protegida por láminas viejas. Al no contar con muchos estudios Jonathan decidió aprender el oficio de la albañilería, en el cual se ha apoyado para salir adelante, además cuenta con el apoyo económico de su compañera de vida. Al observar las filtraciones que su vivienda presento el invierno anterior Jonathan ha decidido cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que las láminas del techo son las que más dañadas se encuentran, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, clavos y alambre para cambiar las láminas del techo de su vivienda y así evitar que sus pocas pertenencias se deterioren a causa de la lluvia.
texts.en:
Jonathan is a young man who is 26 years of age. He and his life companion live in a very modest home that is protected by old metal sheets. Jonathan did not receive much education, so he decided to pursue bricklaying as a trade in order to support himself and get ahead. In addition, his companion also provides financial support.

Noticing that rain was able to infiltrate his home during the last winter season, Jonathan wants to replace the roof of his house. The metal roofing sheets are in very poor condition, so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI. He will invest in galvanized metal sheets, nails, and wire so that he can replace the roof of his home and be able to protect the few belongings that he has from being damaged by the rain.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, nails, and wire so that he can replace the roof of his home.

loans.name: Grupo Xojolá 8 Group

texts.es:
Francisca (la primera del lado derecho de la fotografía de blusa negra) es una mujer que se caracteriza por su trabajo y esfuerzo que realiza día a día para sacar adelante a su familia, ella se encuentra muy agradecida por el crédito al que tuvo acceso, porque  ahora su vida ha cambiado, ella y su grupo ahora solicitan un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en el mantenimiento de café que ya necesita que se le de los cuidados necesarios.
Francisca y su grupo guardan las esperanzas de poder adquirir este crédito para seguir mejorado la calidad de vida de sus familias.
texts.en:
Francisca (the first woman on the right side of the photo wearing a black blouse) is known for her work and the effort she puts forth day after day to help her family get ahead. She is extremely grateful to have been able to access a loan because her life has now changed.

Francisca and the rest of her group are requesting a new loan so that they can invest in the maintenance of their coffee crops. They need to secure whatever is required to provide the necessary care. Francisca and her fellow group members remain hopeful about being able to acquire this loan so that they can continue improving the quality of life of their families.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for maintaining her coffee crop.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is married and has three children, one of whom goes to school. She has no other family members. She sells fish at the market  and has applied for a loan from MCDT-SACCO to buy more baskets of fish. 
Sarah works seven days a week and her major business challenges include seasonality and the ever-increasing prices of fish. She aspires to buy a fridge to keep her stock fresh. She resides in her own house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water.

loans.use: to buy more baskets of fish

loans.name: Armine

texts.en: Armine lives with her daughter and husband in Kapan city in the Syunik region of Armenia. Armine has a good education and for many years she worked as an accountant. After becoming unemployed, little by little she became interested in agriculture.  She cultivates crops on her land and sells potato and beans.  Since she has had some small greenhouses, she also cultivates greens. Her orchard is nice and colorful and she has planted apple, pear, fig and nut trees. She sells her harvest mainly at the city's wholesale market and some parts of it she also uses for her family. Armine is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, young apple trees and also some wire for fencing her land.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, young apple trees and some wire for fencing

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Beatriz es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado. 

Desde hace 3 años inició su propio negocio, un salón de belleza que ubicó en un local.

Trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas sola
Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de su única hija. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor como tratamientos capilares, shampoo, acondicionador, esmaltes para uñas, entre otros, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Beatriz manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a woman who is dedicated to her family and to her work. Her tenacity and perseverance have allowed her to get ahead and overcome various obstacles that have presented themselves along the way. Three years ago she started her own business, a beauty salon that is situated in its own location. Beatriz works alone for 10 hours each day. This business allows her to generate sufficient income to help her husband with the financial responsibilities of their home and to provide for the needs of their only child, a daughter.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of supplies in bulk such as hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, and other products so that she can continue her work and provide more complete service to her customers. She will able to serve them more easily and efficiently. Beatriz will benefit by obtaining wider profit margins from her work.

She says that her greatest wish is to continue in her profession, gain recognition, and strengthen her business so that it becomes more competitive in the marketplace. This would give her the capacity to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Buen Amigo Group

texts.es:
Conformado por 4 mujeres luchadoras, emprendedoras, el Grupo “Buen Amigo”, originarias de la Comarca El fortin, las cuales buscan  financiamiento con ADIM para desarrollar sus respectivos negocios. 
Este grupo lo coordina, Elba del Carmen, ella es una persona activa que a sus 33 años, esposa y madre de 3 hijos de 19, 17 y 11 años, que con su esfuerzo ha podido apoyarlos económicamente. Tiene dos negocios a cargos, el primero es la venta de ropa nueva, esto lo hace por medio de encargos de sus clientes, ofrece blusa, camisas, pantalones, ropa interior para hombre, mujeres y niños. Y su otro ramo que es el de la  preparación  y venta de sopas de carnes en días claves como lunes y jueves. Estas actividades comerciales las comenzó con ayuda de su esposo y con el financiamiento de otro micro-financiero.
Ella solicita crédito para el reforzamiento de su negocio y comprar productos de alta demanda como pantalones y blusas. Entre sus metas quiere ser ejemplo de trabajo y esfuerzo para sus hijos, verlos superarse académicamente e integrarlos al negocio.
Sus otras compañeras son, María del Transito,  59 años que tiene su microempresa de ventas de leche y leña que lo reparte de manera domiciliar (ambulante); María José,  31, prepara y vende variedades de comidas comestible como nacatamales, tamales, enchiladas y tacos; Lidia, 26 años dedicada a la venta por catálogo de productos cosméticos de la marca AVON.
texts.en:
The “Buen Amigo” [Good Friend] Group is comprised of four determined, enterprising women from the district of El Fortin who are asking for a loan through ADIM in order to develop their respective businesses. 
 
This group is coordinated by Elva del Carmen, an active 33-year-old woman who is married. She is mother to three children who are 19, 17 and 11, whom she has been able to support economically thanks to her hard work. She is in charge of two businesses. Her first is a new-clothes-selling business, which she carries out on commission from her customers. She offers blouses, shirts, trousers, and underwear for men, women and children. Her other profession is the making and selling of meat soups on certain days such as Mondays and Thursdays. She began these commercial activities with the help of her husband and with financial support from another micro-financing group. 

She is asking for a loan to strengthen her business by buying high-demand products such as trousers and blouses. One of her goals is to set a good example to her children, as someone who works hard, and to see them better themselves academically and integrate them into the business. 

Her companions in the group are: María del Transito, who is 59 and has a micro-business selling milk and firewood door-to-door; María José, 31, who makes and sells a variety of foods such as "nacatamales" [pork-filled tamales], tamales, enchiladas and tacos; and Lidia, 26, who sells cosmetic products from the AVON catalogue.

loans.use: to buy high-demand products such as trousers and blouses

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
